verses.verse: Deliver<WH2502> me<WH3068>, O Lord, from the evil<WH7451> man<WH120>: preserve<WH5341> me from the violent<WH2555> man<WH376>;
Which imagine<WH2803> mischiefs<WH7451> in their heart<WH3820>; continually<WH3117> are they gathered together<WH1481> for war<WH4421>.
They have sharpened<WH8150> their tongues<WH3956> like a serpent<WH5175>; adders<WH5919>' poison<WH2534> is under their lips<WH8193>. Selah<WH5542>.

Keep<WH8104> me<WH3068>, O Lord, from the hands<WH3027> of the wicked<WH7563>; preserve<WH5341> me from the violent<WH2555> man<WH376>; who have purposed<WH2803> to overthrow<WH1760> my goings<WH6471>.
The proud<WH1343> have hid<WH2934> a snare<WH6341> for me<WH2256>, and cords; they have spread<WH6566> a net<WH7568> by the wayside<WH3027>; they have set<WH7896> traps<WH4170> for me<WH5542>. Selah.
I said<WH559> unto the Lord<WH3068>, You are my God<WH410>: hear<WH238> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications<WH8469>, O Lord<WH3068>.
O God<WH3069> the Lord<WH136>, the strength<WH5797> of my salvation<WH3444>, you have covered<WH5526> my head<WH7218> in the day<WH3117> of battle<WH5402>.
Grant<WH5414> not<WH3068>, O Lord, the desires<WH3970> of the wicked<WH7563>: further<WH6329> not his wicked device<WH2162>; lest they exalt<WH7311> themselves<WH5542>. Selah.
As for the head<WH7218> of those that compass me about<WH4524>, let the mischief<WH5999> of their own lips<WH8193> cover them<WH3680>.
Let burning coals<WH1513> fall<WH4131> upon them<WH5307>: let them be cast into the fire<WH784>; into deep pits<WH4113>, that they rise not up again<WH6965>.
Let not a evil speaker<WH376> be established<WH3559> in the earth<WH776>: evil<WH7451> shall hunt<WH6679> the violent<WH2555> man<WH376> to overthrow him<WH4073>.
I know<WH3045> that the Lord<WH3068> will maintain<WH6213> the cause<WH1779> of the afflicted<WH6041>, and the right<WH4941> of the poor<WH34>.
Surely the righteous<WH6662> shall give thanks<WH3034> unto your name<WH8034>: the upright<WH3477> shall live<WH3427> in your presence<WH6440>.
